title: Flashcards

title: Study
description: This is very basic script to retrieve randomly a line of a file where programming questions are stored. Specifically, each time is called, it will throw you a different question each time. I think I should put more attention oto this projects and make it grow a little

title: Personal Website
description: This is my personal website where I share my experience, projects and blog posts. It is built with completely with vanilla JS, Tailwind CSS and HTML and hosted on GitHub Pages.
